distance.title: Distance
distance.description: Choose how many kilometers/meters away from the city center you want to see.
distance.label: Distance (km)

features.title: Select Feature
features.description: Choose which features you want to see the venues.

time-spent.title: Avg. Elapsed Time
time-spent.description: Determine the average time interval you will spend in venues. The time interval is calculated in minutes.

query.title: Word Search
query.description: Search venue name, description, or tags.
query.label: Word

is-payed.title: Paid Venues
is-payed.description: Check this option if you want to see paid/free venues.
is-payed.label: Paying Places

is-free.title: Free Venues
is-free.description: Check this option if you want to see free venues.
is-free.label: Free Places

types.title: Select Type
types.description: Choose which types of venues you want to see.

review.title: Review Score
review.description: Determine the review range of venues.
